scripts.docker:update: docker compose exec web composer update --ignore-platform-reqs
scripts.docker:generate: docker compose exec -T web php artisan key:generate
scripts.docker:migrate: docker compose exec web php artisan migrate
scripts.docker:migrate-fresh: docker compose exec web php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.docker:schedule: docker compose exec web php artisan schedule:work
scripts.docker:seed: docker compose exec web php artisan db:seed
scripts.docker:artisan: docker compose exec web php artisan
